clintock:BindKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Puts a nucleobase in an empty slot, consuming sugar and phosphate in the process. An amino acid forms when no empty slots remain.

clintock:FluorophoreKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Increases the potency of bound nucleobases.

clintock:NucleobaseKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Fundamental units of the genetic code found in DNA (adenine, cytosine, guanine, thymine).

clintock:NucleosideKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Does not require sugar when binding.

clintock:PeptideChainKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Group of amino acids that activate at the end of each turn.

clintock:PhosphateKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Phosphorus bound to four oxygen residues. Essential molecule in generating nucleotides.

clintock:SugarKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Specifically deoxyribose. Essential molecule in generating nucleotides.
